mapper.insert: insert into purchase (code, member_code, funding_code, price, qty, purchase_state, purchase_date, delivery_number, Courier) values (seq_no.nextval, #{memberCode}, #{fundingCode}, #{price}, #{qty}, #{purchaseState}, sysdate, #{deliveryNumber}, #{courier})
mapper.select: select count(*) from purchase where funding_code = #{_parameter}
